member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeAttributeBase
member.summary: Represents the base class for restricting access to controllers or actions based on Facebook permissions.

member.name: M:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeAttributeBase.GetCurrentPerms(Facebook.FacebookApp,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current user's permission using FQL.
member.remarks: A better method would be to cache the permission in your local database and subscribe to real time updates of user permissions: http://developers.facebook.com/docs/api/realtime

member.name: P:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeAttributeBase.Perms
member.summary: Gets or sets the extended permissions.

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasAuthorizeAttribute
member.summary: Provides funcationality for restricting access to controllers or actions based on Facebook permissions.

member.name: P:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasAuthorizeAttribute.CancelUrlPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the cancel URL path.

member.name: P:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasAuthorizeAttribute.ReturnUrlPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the return URL path.

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasSoftAuthorizeAttribute
member.summary: This filter will send an unauthorized user to the specified view rather than redirecting them directly to the facebook login page. This allows for a landing page to explain to the user why the permissions requested are needed.

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasLinkExtensions
member.summary: Provides extensions for building canvas links.

member.param: if set to true [include implicit MVC values].

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasRedirectResult
member.summary: Controls the processing of application actions by redirecting to a specified canvas iFrame URI.

member.name: M:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasRedirectResult.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasRedirectResult.ExecuteResult(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: Enables processing of the result of an action method by a custom type that inherits from the class.
member.param: The context within which the result is executed.

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasRedirectToRouteResult
member.summary: Represents a result that performs a canvas redirection by using the specified route values dictionary.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Facebook.Web.Mvc.CanvasRedirectToRouteResult.ExecuteResult(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: Enables processing of the result of an action method by a custom type that inherits from the class.
member.param: The context within which the result is executed.

member.name: T:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeInfo
member.summary: Represents the authorization info needed to access the currently request resource.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true [is cancel URL].

member.name: P:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeInfo.AuthorizeUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the authorize URL.

member.name: P:Facebook.Web.Mvc.FacebookAuthorizeInfo.IsCancelReturn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is a cancel return.
member.value: true if this instance is a cancel return; otherwise, false.
